name: Death and Spawn Holdup
description:
Early Version, use at your own risk. Edits BaseSurvivalChar

Makes it so that when a player dies, instead of respawning, they go unconscious for custom amount of seconds (Default 180)

Datacmd DASHSuicide or remove bracelet from main menu to respawn.
Datacmd DASHRevive to get up when downed. (Will be made Admin Only eventually)
Datacmd DASHSettings to open settings. (Admin Only)

TO DO:
-Add optional debuff after death
-Make downed countdown timer visible to all
changeNote:
-Editing BaseSurvivalChar now for hopefully better compatibility
-Players can help each other up now
-Bracelet Pull result customisable
author: Kaeryo
